channel.title: I cant connect to my client (127.0.0.1)
channel.description: i have my azure (runesource) server running fine, but when i run the client, it always says: error connecting to server. I need ur help changing ip. plz. i have Teamviewer... its impossible! Ive done everything!!

item.title: I cant connect to my client (127.0.0.1)
item.dc:creator: @Level_120_Dungeoneer Level 120 Dungeoneering
item.description:
@Level_120_Dungeoneer wrote:

Cannot find ‘server =’

It doesn’t find 127.0.0.1, 0.0.0.0, no-ip, or localhost. In client.java

Read full topic
item.source: I cant connect to my client (127.0.0.1)

item.title: I cant connect to my client (127.0.0.1)
item.dc:creator: @ladaswa ladaswa
item.description:
@ladaswa wrote:

go to source files and server/src/server then make it listening on the port you portforwarded and 127.0.0.1
then go to client files and client.java and search server = (#.#.#.#.) go to google type whats my ip copy and paste and type it there… then compile it all and retry

Read full topic
